content.detailedDescription: I saw this ufo when i was about 7 or 8. but i remember it clearly.  it was after a basketball game, we lost if it matters, we were going to pick my sister up from a friends house and i elected to stay in the car.  i sat, and looked out the front window. then i saw an orange blob i was 8 and cant get an estamite of how far away it was.  it didnt leave a tail, not a metor ect.  it was orange, no airplane or helicoptor.  it moved slowly and even though it was far away i estimate it was a centimeter long, that is if i put what i saw up to a ruler not the actually up close size of the object.  it moved slowly from left to right before disappearing behind trees and a house. it seemed to be level at first then gradually dip down at a very slight angle, i cant be sure though.
content.summary: Orange ufo sighted in 2006

content.detailedDescription: As i was entering a monona grove high school football game, the season opener, i happened to look up at the sky.  i saw a strange object that looked a lot like a shooting star but could not have been one.  lucky for me a few days earlier i had been camping outside of madison.  i was watching the monthly shooting star thing that happens well every month.  i saw lots of shooting stars and they were fresh in my mind. many were hard to see and if there is much light almost imposible. i cannot verify at the moment what direction it started from but moved from right to left. it moved just like a shooting star.  to be honest it could have been a shooting star, but in my mind after what i say just days earlier it seems very unlikely.
content.summary: Ufo that looks like shooting star darts through lit up sky at hs football game

content.detailedDescription: I kept watching them for like 1 hour ... a lot of flying objects in the sky over valencia with some red and blue and white lights ! there was really a lot of movements in the sky this night!!! and also some objects with those lights like chemtrails by night ???
content.summary: Flying objects with blue and red lights

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on our stateroom deck enjoying the sea at night while heading back to new orleans and i noticed what i thought was a meteor at first.  i remember the wind was comming from the north.  at first i thought it was a meteor falling from the north east going south west because of the speed but then it slowed down.  i noticed that there were a few clouds but it was below the clouds and we were a few miles from the coast of mexico.  the object then traveled shortly to the south with a sharp turn.  after a few seconds the object then turned sharply to the west and moved away fast.  it appeared to have a blue dot at the rear section when it had moved to the west.   i could not hear a sound of any sort, but it is a bit loud with the waves to hear.  the approximate time was 815pm cst, after 15 minutes i went inside to see where the ship was located.  for seeing my first unexplained sighting i am pretty excited to share this experience.
content.summary: Yellow sphere in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I need to be taken seriously right now i am not carzy or a lier just because people did not see it does not mean it did not happen..

it was may 3 2008 im pretty sure. it was about 2:00 in the morning i was at my fiances moms farm near kisbey in south east saskatchewan. iwas out late with a buddy sitting on the deck it was a nice warm clear night a good night to just sit back and look at the stars while we talked about our alien theories and what not..Anyways at around 2:00 we noticed a set of lights out in the feild behind the house they were about 600 700 yards away and very low to the ground from what we could see. we stared at them for about 10 mins trying to figure out what they were they appeard to be moving in a circular motion and flashing in a pattern from left to right. we decided to get a better view so we walked up to a near by hill and crouched down but when we did all other lights around faded out of sight except for the rotating lights, at first we thought it was a semi on a dirt road but it just sat there and was far to long to be a semi at such a far distance. so we decided to walk back to the house as we got back onto the deck we saw a bright falsh of light shoot off into the sky the light looked like it came from the object in the field, the light looked kinda like a flar but it was in the shape of what looked like pac-man it only lasted a few seconds and then faded and at about that time we started to hear twigs snapping in the trees all around the house and what sounded like light foot steps in the tall grass we went inside and grabbed a flashlight, when we got outside we walked close to the treeline looking for whatever was in the bushes and then out of nowhere our flashlight died but we kept going i dident want to but i dident want to seem like a baby infront of my buddy anyways everytime we got close to the tree line we would hear a sound on the opposite side of us when we went towards the sound it would move to another part of the tree line almost like there was multiple creatures in the bush and they would make noise anytime we got close to one so that we couldent see it. we did this for about a half hour by the time we got back to the deck it was almost 3:30am we were already scared. my buddy came up with a little test to see if we were alone he is very smart and clever in his mind but what he would do is yell out "if you can understand me snap a twig" and sure enough we heard a loud snap come from the trees i jumped and said a few bad words. then we decided to try another test we went to one side of the yard and ran to the other side as we did we heard something crash through the bushes toward us as if it was eagar to follow us but it stayed in the bushes we were so scared that in mid run we turned on a dime and ran towards the house in fear we went back on to the deck and sat for a min to catch our breath and analize in our heads  what we just heard after a few mins we decided to walk down the ramp behind the house that led around the house to the driveway as we got to the corner of the house we saw something standing in the driveway we could not see its face but it just stood there. we stared at it for about 30 seconds or so when we heard a low whine noise come from behind us we turned to look but found nothing when we looked back to see the creature standing in the driveway it was gone. (the creature was about 6 foot 3 or so it had long arms and a round head but had no clothing from what we could see.)anyways as i was saying i was scared i really wanted to go inside so we decided to go inside. we walked towards the house we had our backs toward the house staring at the driveway when out of nowhere we heard what sounded like a loud gust of wind that slamed a bush near the front door right up against the house and it was loud i did a full 360 jump when we looked at the bush it was pretty much pressed up against the hous i was shaking so bad i had to sit down. when i was on the ground my buddy was infront of me talking to me as i looked up at him i saw a large black shadow on the roof looking down at us as i told him to look it darted away it was really fast, i got up and we ran to the back of the house to see what it was but there was nothing at about that time we noticed a large object in the shape of a triangle move across the sky above the house it had 3 lights on it one on each corner but there was no sound we could feel a slight vibration on the ground but yet no sound, it moved very slow about 10 miles an hour then all of a sudden a bright light luminated the yard and it sped of heading south at an incredible speed then it was gone. a strong sulpher smell filled the air in total shock we went inside and down to my buddy room so that we could regroup and get our minds straight so we could figure out what just happened we did not sleep for the rest of the night we were to scared. about 3 nights later my buddy woke up gasping for air and it was loud enough to wake me and i was in another room i went to see if he was okay he said he could not remember his dream but it felt like something was pressing really hard on his chest and then once againg the strong sulpher smell filled the room but only for about 2 mins. after that for about 3 weeks we had weird dreams constinly smelled sulpher and seen weird lights in the sky almost every night.. i had one dream that was exactly the same for 2 nights in a row i dreamed that i was abducted and taken to a strange place where i was stuck with a needle like object in the corner of my eye i could not speak, scream, or move then everything would go black and id wake up. when i would wake up it would be mornig but it felt like i only slept for a few mins.

to this day we still see strange lights in the sky others have witnessed it as well but i will never forget that night ever it was the most frightning thing i have ever gone through....
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We came into very,very close contact

content.detailedDescription:
About 20 o'clock. clear sky.
my father was walking in the street (in rome)and adverted my mother by phone of a strange event in the sky.
some minutes after, my mother my brother and i were looking toward the sky (in direction north north-west) in the balcony at first floor of our flat. 
we everybody have seen what we never saw before: some spheres, emitting light of red colour with nuances orange.
i saw only 2 spheres, but my father who was the first to see the event talked about 7 spheres at least. so the entire phenomena could be dured several minutes.
the strange spheres seemed to be enough far from us, perhaps one kilometer or more, (the sky was very clear), so their dimension was very small from our point of view, but clearly distinguishable from any other known flying object.
another thing appear very strange: despite the distance the lights were no flashing or blinking but were fixed.
these spheres had a slow ascendent movement and at last vanished in the blu deep of the sky.
content.summary: Several ascending spheres of light (red-orange). slow upward movement.

content.detailedDescription: Just out walking my dog with camera....Felt like snapping a few pictures at  nite..To see what weird thing my camera could catch since i live in ufo central...Took 30 pics and these 2 guys or these 2 bugs where watching me..They probly 100 ft from my house at bed room height...I had problems sleeping last nite...But slept well... i already sent you this picture and im resending this  one picture..I added some more contrast to it and put a red star in it so you can see the mile wide ufo better...
content.summary: 2 large insect et in the air watching me...

content.detailedDescription:
I just learned of your website from (http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=4mmpcafbdjk).  we reported this to nasa, the white house, and some other ufo tracking website. 
 we saw a light on 09/19/09 at about 8:30 (or closer to quarter 'til nine) while on vacation in dewey beach, de.
my husband and i took our two kids and dog to the beach at night because the children had never been on the beach at night time and dogs were now allowed.
i decided to take the dog back to the house. i turned to look back at my family (they were about 80 feet away)when i noticed a brightly lit, silent object directly above and just to the right of them. i ran back thinking that it was a helicopter search light and that they would be hurt by blowing sand.  wrong.  thant was just the mind trying to rationalize. this object was extremely low. lower than a hotel but higher than a house. i yelled ���look up!��� and that���s when they saw it. i suppose they didn���t notice it because it seems like the light made a fog (the fog ���made��� a cloud at the bottom that was so dense that the light didn���t touch the ground) -but the light was on the water. the bright circular object & the associated fog jerked to the left and now it was directly above their heads above their heads; so i ran back to them and we stood there in shock. not a sound. the dog didn���t even seem to care. we too were not afraid, but felt curious.  i can't tell if it was a craft or if the light was coming from a hole like a dimension if that makes sense. this is the strange part....My family saw a light with nothing fancy about it... me, the light was perfectly white and circular with a dark center and a dark line going from the center to the right edge of the circle. i kept sawing, why is it dark in the middle like that and they said it wasn't. i pointed to exactly what i was talking about and they saw something different. it felt like i was showing them a sapphire bracelet and they were seeing rubies. our experience was less than a minute. the light just vanished or went out(silly me for blinking or perhaps it was my angle under the fog-cloud.) but my husband and one daughter stated that the light did go out but then in about one second it had shot itself from right above our heads straight up. we totally expected to see this in the newspaper since a small plane was in the area (within a mile or two) and passed right behind it.  a few weeks later i was youtubing  some terms and came across a news program that was discussing it.  of course the news program didn't mention delaware so i thought i would let you know in case you documented this even.

this is exactly what we saw: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=zqustezhy3g

if you go to the site below, you will see that so many saw this at the exact same time across the us and canada not just the east coast on september 19, 2009 (like a code huh?) they all appeared at the same time, for the same duration and they all jerked in a direction before vanishing.  none of the 200 or so witnesses claimed to have felt any fear just curiosity... that's interesting.


http://www.Ufoworldnews.Com/2009/09/19/bright-light-in-the-sky-emanating-an-intense-cone-shaped-light-and-trailing-smoke-or-fog/comment-page-1/#comment-2145


i'll attach a photo in a bit
michelle pasta
content.summary: On the beach about 90 feet over our heads -taller than house shorter than hotel.

content.detailedDescription: Two witnesses to a bright ufo in east taunton massachusetts. south western sky. object was brightly lit in the night sky. white was primary light and intense. changed to a red to blue light intermittently. object was swaying slightly like a pendulum. distance from object could not be determined due to location in sky. airplane's passed at same time and there was no similarity between the object and the aircraft. neither witness could identify what they observed.
content.summary: Very bright star like object..

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out of window, looked up and above tree level and object moving to
my right. bright white, changed colors to gold, and red. moving very fast. we had noticed on several nights that there were strange lights in our areas. they would move, and dissappear.
content.summary: Saw an object go over my house, white, red and yellow flashing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 5:30 am in the driveway filming random nonsense and i saw the light moving very fast and in different directions i assumed it was just my eyes but it was not.After about a minute and a half went by it stoped in mid air.I got a picture of it but its not very good.It stayed still in the same location for about 13 seconds before fading out into the sky.Taken with my camera phone.I dont have flash so the pic is raw

p.S gwen made me do this -_-"
content.summary: I saw a bright object moving very fast in different directions.

content.detailedDescription:
Flying from north to south at maybe about 50 mph at 9:30 pm pst, was a  black silhouette of what looked like a black disc edge on.  the profile of the thing never changed shape as it flew over.  it was kind of like two long, skinny cones with rounded tips glued together at the base.  the two ends displayed huge bright white non-flashing lights that lit my front yard as it flew over.  it had to be about 70 to 100 feet long.  it made a very loud buzzing noise as it flew over like an extra large lawn mover engine.  it had a gigantic red light in the middle of it about twice the size of the two white lights.  none of the lights flashed.  it flew about 50 feet over the top of my house and then once it got over the mad river, it followed the river east and then cut to the right as it followed the ridge line of fickle hill out of site.  all total, the siting lasted about 2 - 3 minutes.  i couldn't get my dang cellphone camera out fast enough to snap a pic.  dammit!!  this thing was very bizarre as it flew lengthwise forward and not like a missile.  i've never seen anything like it.

i live about 6 miles east of arcata, california outside of a little town called blue lake.

erik 

1) i was in the house on the computer when i heard it approaching.  i thought is was a plane but it sounded funny.

2) the funny sound

3) a kit helicopter of sorts.  

4) it glided and banked slowly and smoothly

5) excited.  i tried to get my cellphone camera out fast enough but i couldn't make my hands work right i was so jittery and shocked at what i was seeing.  this is all but unheard of in humboldt county northern california.  we only have one major airport and it can only land commuter planes!

6)  it flew over the ridge line in front of my house.
content.summary: Anomalous cigar shaped craft with 3 lights flew within 50 feet over my house!

content.detailedDescription: As my friend (pilot and works for spirit airlines)  and i were looking up at the downtown miami skyline i noticed a small flying object in the sky. it was a triangular shape with red lights. it moved slowly and descended down onto the water it landed. it was close enough for me to recognize that it wasn't a plane and it made no noise.  it drifted to the right and stopped for a few minutes. i noticed a small boat that passed by it and the ufo's light shut off and after the boat passed it turned back on. then the ufo drifted to the left about a mile then the lights went off again and it disappeared from my sight..
content.summary: Small, with red lights

content.detailedDescription: about 9:35 i was sitting outside with four others and i was facing the south.  the next thing i noticed was a light single engine plane with four landing lights on.  these lights alternated in a rapid pattern, very unusual.  i could see the landand lights from the back.  i was looking east and there was an intense which stayed on 4-5 seconds.  as soon as it disappeared another one appeared two miles further to the east. this stayed on 4-5 seconds.  the single engine plane came back to the area as if searching.  this was at the east of goldwater range.
content.summary: Intense bright white light with blue hue stationary in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was waiting for my next flight..I was talking to a co-worker when i looked up and from the south direction way up in the night sky was this v shaped object with one light at the tip, then two and two. i watched it for about 5 sec. and told my friend to get out and look at this object. i looked back up and there it was. slowly coming overhead when it turned slowly to the east and vanished. by the time my friend got out, it was gone. it looked so strange up there, not like normal aircrafts.
also,
i was watching the movie "jaws" and noticed a white light object jetting through the background, leaving a slight trail that sometimes turned a reddish color, when you go frame by frame. i was knocked out and played it over and over.(i hope you check this out!) and if you let the film run about 1 minute more, when the scene changes to the boat sitting in water with the fog and clouds in the background, another,or, the same one,  enters from the left side of the film, and heads towards the fog and dissapears. the first sighting is when roy schnider (chief) goes to get his gun cause the boat is sinking. its a night scene.
i hope you get back with me after you analize it.
was it a shooting star? i personally dont think so.
and...And anyone else ever noticed it?
content.summary: Shaped like a "v" - 5 little lights

content.detailedDescription: I let my indoor cats outside to get some fresh air, while sitting in my chair i saw a silver object. at first i thought it was a airliner high in the sky as i had watched several cross the sky earlier. this was different. the silver disk shaped object did not move in any direction for several mins. as i watched longer ,it seemed to move very slowly to the left then stop and moved back very slowly to its original postion. as i watched i tryed to consider what i was seeing. i knew this was not a balloon as it did not drift or rise in the wind. i was facing east and the object was n.E. at a 45 degree angle. the object seemed to be very high in the sky.I would say 30,000 to 40,000 ft up. i had the impression the object was spinning but cant say for sure because of the distance. after watching the object for 10 mins,i ran for the back door to get my wife to see it, when we got back outside less than a min later the object was no longer visible. i live near a major air corridor and see all kinds of aircraft all the time. this was unlike anything i have ever seen. i was very disappointed that my wife missed it, as it was very odd. the other high aircraft were making short contrails but this object had none. i had the impression as i watched the object that i was seeing something very unusual and strange. the object seemed brighter that other aircraft reflecting sunlight, because its was small enough that i could have easily missed it, if not for its brightness. it was like polished chrome in appearence.
content.summary: Silver disk shaped object hovering in one spot

content.detailedDescription:
While at a local bingo night in grants pass, oregon on friday, march 26, 2010, about 10-15 of us were outside in the parking lot during break time (approx. 8:45 pm).  after being there for a minute or two, someone said "what is that?".  looking up towards the high south section of sky, we saw 4 bright orange-gold-yellow lights (kind of star shaped, but also looking slightly like the lights were in a triangle format).  they were moving very slowly upward toward each other from different places in the sky (#1 higher and slightly towards the west, #2 slightly lower "under" #1 and slightly towards the west from #1, #3 was placed quite a bit lower than #2 slightly towards the east, and #4 was much lower and more to the east of the other lights, moving slowly upward toward the higher lights).  the #1 light suddenly disappeared when it reached a certain spot (which we thought may have been a cloud, although no "light" showed behind the space at the place where it disappeared - it just "winked out"). meanwhile, the other three lights were slowly converging on the same area where the #1 light disappeard.  the #2 light slowly moved towards the east and disappeared in about the same place a few seconds (maybe 30 secs) later.  as the other two were converging on that area of the sky, another light (#5) began to come up from the area where the #4 light had been at first sighting (this all took about 3-5 minutes).  about 1 minute later the #3 light disappeared in the same section of sky as #1 and #2, and about a minute after that, another light appeared (#6) from the same area as #4 and #5, continuing upward, angling toward where the other lights had disappeared.  within approx. 4-5 minutes more, all but #6 had "winked out".  #6 seemed to stay in place for about 20-30 seconds after the #5 light had gone out, then slightly and slowly angled to the area where the others disappeared, and "winked out".  we stayed for a couple of minutes more, then went inside.

we obviously talked about it while it was happening and afterwards, but everyone was baffled and said they had never seen anything like it.  we discussed that we didn't think it could be helicopters because they came what seemed to be too close to each other before they blinked out, and there was absolutely no noise.  we also agreed that they could not have been flares, due to no smoke trails, and their speed was very slow.  their direction also seemed purposeful as the lights seemed to curve in their ascent towards the spot where they all blinked out, although they did not seem to radically change direction.  a couple of us suggested they may be "weather balloons" with lights, but none of us knew if weather balloons are used anymore, and everyone thought their ascent to the spot where they disappeared was very purposeful.  the lights were very bright and i don't remember noticing the placement of the moon.  we never witnessed any "zipping around" or fast movement, except the #6 light seemed to move slightly faster after it's pause, but still slowly.  the sky seemed to us to be clear of any visible clouds where we were looking.  there was no ambient light that i noticed other than the disappearing lights to show anything in the dark sky, and the disappearing lights did not cast ambient light on anything that we could see.  several people used their cellphones to capture a picture of the lights, but sadly i didn't have my cellphone with me.  i can't really estimate the height of the area where the lights blinked out, but it seemed very high in the sky and fairly far from us - they were far away enough for us to discuss the fact that it was probably over the oregon coast, or even over the wster.  after the slight pause before disappearing, the #6 light seemed to move slightly faster, but still slowly.
content.summary: Several lights moving up in atmosphere from sw lower sky in s-sw portion of sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming out of work, walking across the parking lot.  i am in the habit of looking at the sky.
noticed an amber light.  it looked like a plane coming in for a landing, but very far out.  the humidity was high. no stars visible. (there is an airport up the hill from my work place)
as i wathced the light dimmed out and another light lit up a bit above the level of the first light.
i thought it was the plane banking to the left.  there was no sound.  i continued to watch.  the second light dimmed as another light began to brighten,  this was a bit higher than the second one.
i knew then it wasn't a plane.  as i watched, the 3rd light dimmed as a fourth lite came on.
again, this one was a bit higher than the rest.  still amber in color.  the lights continued 6 or 7 more times.  each one higher than the next - in a straight line.   none of them moved or drifted as a flare would.  they were low in the sky.  just over the hills of west lebanon.  they started in the south and lit up going towards the north.   they were spaced about 4 - 5 inches apart, by my fingers.
as this was happening, one of my coworkers came up to me and asked what i was looking at.
i pointed and asked him if he saw it.  he said he did.  we agreed that we didn't hear any sound coming from it.  as we watched a small plane came from the airport and flew over head, heading west.  of course we heard that very clearly.  after it was gone, the lights continued.  no sound could be heard from that direction.
i couldn't see an object.  it was dark, overcast and the lights from the parking lot prevented seeing anything but the lights.  after the last light dimmed, i ran to my car to try to get away from the town lights.   i couldn't see anything in the sky at all.
i asked some friends if anyone else had seen anything.  one friend had a friend who reported seeing the same thing, from lebanon.   i was in west lebanon at the time.  whatever it was must have been enormous.
i was very excited to see this.  it is the 3rd "ufo" i've witnessed in almost 30 years.
wish i could've seen something other than just lights.  wish i could've video taped it.
content.summary: Lights in straight line, dimmed as another lit up.  lasted a few minutes

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were jumping on  the the trampoline we were trying to jump and see over our appel tree i finally jumped over it and i saw something at the corner of my eye so i got off and put on my shoes went over to see what it was and right there it was a very thin ufo with a half globe on top of it me and my friend went in to get our phones to take a picture but when we got out it was gone
content.summary: We were jumping on the trampoline and suddenly a ufo was right next to a tree we freaked out but we went to get a camera and it was gone

content.detailedDescription:
On march 25th around 4:15pm, when to get the mail from my complex mail box, was walking towards my condo, when look up to look a the moon, suddenly i saw  some blinking ligths movign like in zig -zag kind of like very playful in the sky.  i call my husband to look it up, and he say he saw many of them too.  but he was skeptical about it, he told me is our eyes playing a trick on us.
he did see the flashing ligths for sure.  we when back into the house amaze on what we have seen. all this is sitll in my mind and having dreams about it.  in one of my dreams,  they were lifting me up, it seams like they speak by telephaty.  it seams like they are getting ready for an even that is going to  happen here on earth and they are ready to rescue us.  they kept telling me that more are coming and everyone will be able to see more of them.  they are going to reveal themselves to us.  i am not understanding the meaning of all this.  but they are here and they are allowing people to see them even with a naked eye.  so we have the evidence and people start to prepare themselve for what is coming... that is what telephaticly was transfer to me.  (i am affraid to talk about this, don't want people to think i am crazy).
thank you and hope this helps..
feel free to contact me. i don't have any physicall evidence, like pictures or videos. only what we saw.
content.summary: White dots, blinking close to the moon. flash on flash off, moving different directions, there were many of them. it was an amazing display of white shiny dots.

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture in t or t new mexico in 07, its a picture of my two little cousins on a horse which were cut out.  picture shows three oval shape objects on right hand corner which i did not see at the time, but appeared in the photo...
content.summary: Three objects in my photo

content.detailedDescription:
At a little after 8pm i was outside in the barn finishing up feeding and went back in the house and noticed something weird in the western sky horizon.. well i got the binocs out and looked and it was something bright yellow but off in the distance but i could get a pretty good look thru the binocs. i got my mom and she saw it as well. we both agreed it looked like a dusk to dawn light but it was definitely in the sky. i tried to video it but it wouldnt show up in my camera at all! well i tried to get closer as it wasn't moving at all. well i got on the road and could see it had moved off to the northwest and in a matter of seconds it was gone. so i was driving back home and had just turned onto the main road to my dead end road and saw it again appear over a neighbors farm.. i got out the binocs and it indeed was the same thing. i tried to get closer and when i looked for it again as i drove up it was gone!

now my dad has said he's seen it a couple times as well coming home from bowling past tuesday nights.. now i also found this weird.. one monday late afternoon it was still light outside we saw what looked like an airplane in the air but it wasn't it had 2 headlights like a car but we couldn't see a plane or any object at all.. it was heading straight south and all of a sudden it was just gone..
content.summary: Barn light object in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I first saw a strange light in the sky that very much looked like an approaching helicopter.  it caught my attention because it was orange, where usual helicopters have a white glow.  i stared at it for a few seconds and then it started dropping smaller white lights, and my first reaction was that it was dropping bombs.  i didn���t think it was a ufo at this point, i thought it was an army helicopter or other army aircraft.  i left my room to go get my mom���s camera and returned with her and the camera only to find that the mysterious orange light was gone.  i looked throughout all the windows in the house, it was nowhere in sight.  i thought about it and brushed it off and a ���helicopter dropping flares��� because it was the only logical explanation i could come up with.  this was at approximately midnight on march 27, 2010.
	about an hour later, i woke up and my window was still open.  it was then i saw that the smaller crafts that were dropped were all clustered and flying around in unusual patterns in the north west sky out of my window.  i looked at them for four hours and couldn���t figure it out.  i���m positive that they were what came out of the orange glowing craft.  they would fly diagonally, horizontally, vertically, and make turns that couldn���t possibly be made by any aircraft here on earth.  i seen them appear from point a to point b.  there was no trace of light as they flew because it was so fast.  they, like the orange ufo, were silent.  i watched them from 1:00 am to about 5:00 am then i thought i had enough and shut the blinds and tried to sleep.  i didn���t see when, or if, they left, but i did hear a loud and unusually low jet fly by a little before sunset that woke me up.  i checked, and didn���t see them anymore after that. 
	the orange ufo was high in the open sky, and the white smaller ones were unusually lower than the mountain range that is outside my window.  it was an extremely windy night so the sky was clear.  
	i don���t see how i could be the only one to see this, i���m sure others seen it as well.  it lasted for hours.  

( i reported this to another website and simply copied and paste the report)
content.summary: Large craft dropping off smaller crafts that lingered for about 5 hours

content.detailedDescription:
I was travling south on us31 in tipton co. i noticed what i thought was a plane to the southwest. it was travling northeast. mabye about a 1000 ft up. the light was white, and i kept looking for the flashing lights like on a plane. as i watched, it crossed right over my car still heading northeast, and i still couldn't see any lights blinking. i had my camera and wanted to get a picture. so i pulled over to the east on a county road,
got out of the car, and it was gone. it was twlight out, and the sky was totally clear. it was just gone. i thought if it was a plane, i could have still seen it. the whole thing only lasted mabye 3-5 minutes, but i stayed out in the country another 20 minutes watching the sky in case it re-appeared. but i didn't see anything else. i'm reporting this, just in case someone else saw it too, and will know what it was, or come forward with more information.
content.summary: White light, thought it was a plane at first, but it dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: My father, mother, and i were traveling back from a family trip to bemidji, minnesota where we had family. we were traveling in my family's 2001 buick lesabre and it was about 9:30 at night. we were about an half hour or so away from devils lake and my father and i were talking and listening to the radio while my mother was asleep in the passenger seat. i was sitting in the back looking out the rear view window when i noticed a small light moving in the sky. at first i thought it was an airplane, because we see those all the time, but there was no blinking lights on the object that i usually associate with a plane. i didn't really think much of it at first, i just kept watching it to pass the time on the way home. the object was moving about the speed of an airplane, going from east to west across the sky. suddenly, however the object in the sky began to slow down and start to make a small circle in the sky, before coming to a complete stop for about a half a second or so and then it suddenly darted off towards the east, going very fast, covering probably a fourth of the sky in about a second before it disappeared. it looked liked it had moved higher up in altitude as well. after seeing this i was shocked because i had never seen anything like it and to this day i still don't know how to explain what i saw. i immediately told my father what i saw, but he didn't see anything and wasn't terribly inclined to believe me.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo moving slowly across the sky before abruptly moving in opposite direction at speeds.

content.detailedDescription:
Any night the skies are clear i can look out the window and see an orb like object above my house. about a year ago i was looking at stars and this caught my eye. at first this object would only change colors. red, white or orange are the colors i would see the most. as nights went by i would regularly check out this object. one particulary night i was looking at this object pretty hard and it seemed to start to get brighter almost as if it was moving closer to me. and it was, it got so close and so bright i could even see a red ball of light rotating around it. which explained it turning red at times. i even decided to show some of my friends and they were surprised at what they were seeing too. 

about a month ago i was looking out the window just checking it out like normal. although this time i was concentrating very hard on it. suddenly the slight movements i had seen in the past (ones that kinda made me think i was crazy)turned into full out zips across the sky. when this first happened i was terrified and went into the house and locked the doors. now whenever i get bored at night i go to my window and look at the object just to pass time. and as crazy as this sounds when i'm staring at the object, in my mind i'll be thinking about what way i'd like to see the object move and sure enough it will move that way. another night i was looking at the object and it was pretty bright. so i thouht i would photograph it so i went inside to get my camera. when i came back outside it was so far away i could barely see it. i took the camera back inside and when i came back out it was bright again. last night after watching this object move so rapidly through the sky i felt i had to let someone know that mattered.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: On clear nights there is always an orb like object in the skies above my house.

content.detailedDescription: I was in the car with the biggest skeptic in the world, and he starts yelling ""you see thats what im talking about. i looked up to the sky and saw about 6 fireballs in formation of a boomerang that dissappeared and reappeared. in all there were 7 witnesses. i was in so much shock that i didnt remember that my camera was in the car! im not sure that the date i wrote down was corrected but i am positive that it was a ufo!I know that about a month before this sighting he had seen the same thing but it was a lime glowing light. we live right by the bay and thats where the sightings have happened. i find myself searching the skies everyday since.I lost sight of it when it completely dissapeared. weirdest thing was that we liv next to a airbase and approx. 10 min after the sighting we heard that the jet planes were set out. 25 min later we saw a object flying really high flying quickly in the dark sky then it stopped for a split second then it zoomed by so fast.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: It dissappears and reappears i think they can go invisible

content.detailedDescription: I and a friend went to a bbq at my sisters house in riverside california. we left the bbq around midnight. my friend was driving and i was in the passenger seat with my head against the window, dozing. we were driving down the 91 freeway in riverside, in the slow lane, headed towards the 57 freeway to costa mesa, where we lived. as we were driving, i noticed the sign on the freeway said we were at weir canyon. as it was a saturday night, there was alot of traffic on the freeway. i closed my eyes and began to relax for the long ride home. as i began to doze, a distinct thought came to my mind. the thought said, "turn your head and look out the window." i turned my head, and i saw a red "ball shaped" object that looked like it was perhaps 20 to 30 feet away from me. as we were in the slow lane, there was nothing beyond that but the shoulder of the freeway. no houses, no lights, just barren fields, completely dark. i thought the red ball odd, as i had traveled that freeway many times and that area is totally undeveloped. nothing there. as we drove, i noticed the ball was keeping up with us. i didn't say anything at the moment to the driver. i just watched it. finally i said, "why don't you speed up a little." she did and the ball kept up. i strained to look at it, to see if it was a reflection of some kind, possibly from our own car. i said to her, now slow down a little, so she slowed the car, and the ball was still right with us. she asked what i was doing, and i told her about the ball. she looked and saw it too. she pulled over on the shoulder and stopped. we got out to look at it, and it disapeared. i figured it was a reflection. so i took the wheel this time, and waited for the traffic to move ahead so i could get out in the lane. this time, i moved to the center lane, turned on the radio and began to cruise home. all of a sudden, i saw what looked to me like white car lights coming toward me in my lane. i called her attention to it, and she became frightened. it looked exactly like a potential head on collision. i looked to my right and left, to see if i could move in to another lane to get away from it, but the traffic was heavy on both sides and in back of me. i couldn't move in any direction. i layed on the horn, the lights were comming closer, i couldnt change lanes. this all happened in a split second, or so it seemed to me. i slammed on my brakes, knowing i would surely get hit from behind. i brought my knees up behind the wheel and covered my face with my hands, waiting to be hit from the back and head on. i waited, but nothing happened. when i uncovered my face, i saw that the lights in front of me in my lane, was not in my lane at all, but "above" my lane. i watched it moving slowly. i could see the front of it. it was arch shaped in the front, like a horseshoe shaped bumber, with a purplish hue around it and three huge lights under it. it moved slowly over my car, and i turned to watch through the back window and saw it move slowly away. it was enormous. i opened the door and got out. there was no sound from the craft, no sounds of any kind. at that moment, i noticed there was no traffic on the freeway. it was completely empty. there was no one. i took the keys to start the car, and realized i had not shut it off when i slammed it in to park, yet it was off. i started the car and sped off, scared to death, running red lights all the way home. when i got home, i looked at the clock. it was 4:30 in the morning. i couldn't understand why it was so late. i was tired and confused. i went to bed. when i woke up the next morning, i didnt feel well. i told a neighbor about what i saw. he said "lets go back tonight, and see if we can see something." fear shot through me. i didn't want to go, but they razed me until i went. as we traveled down the same freeway, we came up to weir canyon again. i noticed there was aprox 50 cars pulled over on the shoulder, with people standing outside their cars, looking up. we did the same thing. there must have been a thousand of those red balls darting back and forth, flying around, like playing tag with each other. then suddenly an enormous white light, just popped on in the middle of the sky. the crowd gasp, and then the light went off again. i jumped in to the car and drove down the freeway to the next underpass and got off, going to the gas station at the bottom. i asked the gas attendent there if there was an airport near. he said there was. it was a light plane airport not far from there. i decided to go there to check it out, but before i could go, a huge white helicopter, with blacked out windows, flew over the overpass and hovered over my car. it looked like military, but i couldn't be sure. the blades were kicking up dust so bad, i couldn't hardly keep my eyes open, but i did see the pilot clearly. it hovered over my car for several minutes, then it flew off in the direction i had just come from. i knew this was no mistake, no coincedence. this all had something to do with what i had seen the night before. i went to the airport and watched the planes coming in and out for over an hour. no way was there anything there that even remotely resembled what i saw on either night. after that, i went home, and went to work the next morning. i wasnt feeling well, so i decided to make a doctors appointment. i went the following day. they did some test, and bloodwork. when i left the doctor, i couldnt find my car in the parking lot. it took me over an hour to find it. once i got in, i had forgotten how to start the car. when i finally got it started i got lost on the way to work. when i finally got there to pick up my friend, my shift was over and we went home. she said she felt sick too. she cried for three days, not knowing why. i asked her what was wrong, she said she didnt know. she just cried, she suffered severe depression which was unusual for her. i went to work and found i couldnt remember how to operate my machine. i had trouble walking, as my gate was completely off. to make a long story short, over aprox a months time, i slowly and surely deteriorated, little by little. i lost my job, my car, and my home, as i got sicker and sicker, becoming incapable of supporting myself. i developed a stutter that i had never had before in my life. my head and neck tilted to the right and was unable to straighten it. my doctor said for some reason, my autonomic nervous system was shot. i did not tell him what happened that night, as i believed he would think i was crazy. i was sick like that, and on medications for three years. it took three years for me to re-learn how to drive again. it has been years now, and although i am able to work, it has been a hard climb up. i still have lingering disabilities from this. all these years, i have been looking for anyone who witnessed what i saw those two nights. i have been looking for answers, and have found nothing. i watched a documentary the other night and learned of your organization, which is why i'm writing you now. i have no photos of it. i have blogged for years to try to find anyone at all who saw what i saw. i have had no luck. today, i still have memory problems in that i still have no sense of direction, and can get lost in my own neighborhood. my walking gate never got better, and i still stutter from time to time. i don't know what happened to me, but something sure did.
content.summary: On 91 freeway, craft flew a couple of feet above my car, lost track of time, was sick for three years after that.

content.detailedDescription: I remember there was a white light that turned into three lights but it looked like it was on the same ship or craft or whatever you want to call it.Then the three white lights turned in to different colored lights swirling and changing color scanning the ground. i remember my dad saying it looked like a chopper. but then when the lights changed color he didn't know what it was. it also had no sound to it. all of the family were getting excited about it because it was so close to us. but i can't remember anything else from that night except my uncle would not sleep by himself. later on my family said something about what looked like a  bolt of lighting going down the valley but i don't remember that. as i was too young.
content.summary: Vally springs event in early 80's by camp site with family.

content.detailedDescription: I was in jr high school when i seen it. me and a friend were going to his house i was on my bike he was on foot. i seen the green light and told my friend about it. at witch point he ran to his house. while i got off my bike laid it down, then waved to the light. at that point it seemed to slow down or stop. it stayed there for a few more seconds then it took off faster than it had came. it was still traveling in the same direction. the street we were on was south 5th street headed to 7th street.
content.summary: Green  light over hughson moving north east to south west
